footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Navia | Update Date: 01/13/2024 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Verdict__
Navia's BIS. Has everything she wants.

__Serpent Spine__
Given good dodges or a shield, can out-damage Verdict at high refinements.

__“Ultimate Overlord’s Mega Magic Sword”__
Event exclusive weapon, which covers her energy requirements. However, any in the substats can be wasted.

__Tidal Shadow__
Best Craftable option available. Recommended to run a healer.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Beacon of the Reed Sea, Wolf's Gravestone, The Unforged, Redhorn Stonethresher, Skyward Pride__
5 star statsticks that generally don't have perfect synergies with Navia.

__Prototype Archaic, Katsuragikiri Nagamasa__
Other craftable options that may beat Tidal Shadow without healing.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Energy Recharge|<goblet> Geo DMG Bonus%|<circlet> CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Ceremonial Crystalshot
**2)** Normal Attack: Blunt Refusal
**3)** Elemental Burst: As the Sunlit Sky’s Singing Salute

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: The Nighttime Whispers in the Echoing Woods set is considered resin inefficient, but is definitely her best set.
